sub_title: An experienced production supervisor with a Bachelor of Engineering degree seeking a challenging role as a Junior/Trainee Mechanical Engineer.
summary: Experienced professional with a strong background in supply chain management, production supervision, and engineering. Skilled in driving operational excellence, implementing safety protocols, and optimizing manufacturing processes. Knowledge of managing trading businesses, maintaining vendor relationships, and providing end-to-end customer support. Recognized for innovation, including the invention of a new embossing die, resulting in improved efficiency and accolades. Adept at documentation, compliance, and problem-solving utilizing Kaizen and 5S methodologies. Seeking new opportunities to leverage skills in supply chain management and manufacturing operations.

profile_positions.description:
• Managed the daily plan and production orders, ensuring smooth operations throughout the end-to-end production cycle.
• Implemented new safety protocols, resulting in improved efficiency and waste reduction.
• Provided maintenance support for production equipment, ensuring optimal performance.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance communication and streamline processes.
profile_positions.title: Production Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Managing the trading business of all types of packaging materials like:
1] BOPP tapes- Plain, brown and all types of printing.
2] Stretch films
3] Strapping rolls
4] Shrink bags
5] Corrugated boxes

• Successfully managed a trading business for various packaging materials, ensuring consistent supply and timely delivery.
• Utilized VYAPAAR Application to record sales and purchase orders, maintaining accurate transactional details.
• Additionally, I developed and maintained strong vendor relationships, ensuring high-quality materials and services.
• I Generated GST invoices and ensured compliance with tax regulations.
• Moreover, I provided end-to-end customer supply chain support, following the SCOR model methodology.
profile_positions.title: Business Owner (Supply Chain Manager)

profile_positions.description:
• As an Engineering Technician, I compiled and tracked data for daily production orders, consistently meeting monthly targets in the body shop department. 
• I led a successful Change Management project where I invented a new embossing die for the Rotavator machine, effectively reducing the manufacturing process to a single operation.
• Furthermore, I actively participated in Preventive maintenance activities and skillfully handled machine breakdown situations in accordance with a weekly Schedule, all while managing internal ERP data in SAP.
• Implemented the Kaizen-TPM-5S methodology, driving continuous improvement in production processes.
• Actively participated in maintenance activities and effectively handled machine breakdown situations.

# Project:

• Invention of Trailing Board Embossing Die:
One of my notable accomplishments was the development of a cutting-edge embossing die for the Trailing Board of the Rotavator machine. This ground-breaking invention significantly reduced the manufacturing process by streamlining it into a single operation, resulting in improved efficiency. The introduction of this new embossing die not only reduced the cycle time by an impressive 50% but also significantly minimised the manpower required for the operation.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Technician
